OOC: Err, stupid nonscence polls!  Well, anyway, for the Megaton battle
poll, NONE of Firestorm's chars should battle him.  That would be way
stupid.  I think it would be cool if Necromancer fought him, afterall,
without Necromancer, Megaton wouldn't be what he is.

BIC:  Necromancer smiled back.

         "We've been-" Necromancer was rudely interrupted by Hell Drak.

         "We've been just fine alright, why does everybody always ask that?
Sheesh, seems everybody in the universe is a dweebocon," she said.

         "Same as ever...." Necromancer muttered to Prowl.
